Policies and Initiatives.title: In face-recognition first, Delhi Police personnel to wear AI smart glasses in R-Day crime fight
Policies and Initiatives.summary: Delhi Police personnel will wear AI smart glasses equipped with face-recognition technology to enhance security during the Republic Day celebrations. This initiative marks a first in the use of AI-powered smart glasses for face recognition in law enforcement. The smart glasses aim to help police identify and prevent potential crimes.

Policies and Initiatives.title: HCLTech Partners With Carahsoft To Drive IT Efficiencies in US Public Sector
Policies and Initiatives.summary: HCLTech has partnered with Carahsoft to drive IT efficiencies in the US public sector. Additionally, HCLTech has also partnered with Team Global Express to digitize multimodal logistics using AI. These partnerships aim to leverage technology to improve operations and efficiency.

Policies and Initiatives.title: Salman Khan gets Delhi HC notice: Chinese AI app files plea over order on personality rights
Policies and Initiatives.summary: The Delhi High Court has issued a notice to Salman Khan in response to a plea by a Chinese AI app seeking to overturn an interim injunction granting Khan personality rights. The AI platform claims the order negatively impacts its operations. Khan has been directed to file a reply to the plea within four weeks.

Policies and Initiatives.title: WEF Davos: Karnataka holds talks with Bharti, PayPal, Mistral AI on expansion
Policies and Initiatives.summary: Karnataka held talks with companies like Bharti, PayPal, and Mistral AI at WEF Davos to discuss expansion opportunities. The state pitched investment opportunities in areas such as data centres and AI hubs. Deputy CM Shivakumar promoted Bengaluru as the "city of the future" to attract international investment.

Policies and Initiatives.title: Tagbin’s Immersive Media Platform Finds Enterprise Niche In The AI Age
Policies and Initiatives.summary: Tagbin, an immersive technology and AI startup, has found a niche in the enterprise sector with its innovative platform. The company has worked on notable projects, including designing a virtual statue of Netaji Subhash Chandra Bose. Tagbin's platform utilizes immersive media to create engaging experiences, catering to the growing demand for interactive technologies in the enterprise space.

Events.title: OpenAI CEO Sam Altman likely to visit India in Feb: ChatGPT maker expected at India AI Impact Summit 2026 - What we know so far
Events.summary: OpenAI CEO Sam Altman is expected to visit India in mid-February for the India AI Impact Summit. The summit is scheduled to take place from February 16-20, 2026, at Bharat Mandapam in New Delhi. Altman's visit is anticipated to be a key part of the event, which will focus on the impact of AI in various sectors.

Events.title: AI Impact Summit next month, PWD to beautify Delhi
Events.summary: The AI Impact Summit is scheduled to take place next month, although details about the event are scarce. Meanwhile, the Public Works Department (PWD) has announced plans to beautify Delhi. The connection between the AI summit and the PWD's beautification project is not specified in the available information.

Major AI Developments.title: AI and unstructured data: A roadmap for India's digital transformation with elastic CEO
Major AI Developments.summary: Elastic CEO discusses India's digital transformation roadmap, focusing on AI and unstructured data. The conversation highlights the importance of leveraging AI to extract insights from unstructured data, driving business growth and innovation. India's digital transformation is expected to be fueled by effective management and utilization of this data.

Major AI Developments.title: CBDT awards ₹3000 crore contract to LTIMindtree for building AI-powered tax analytics platform
Major AI Developments.summary: The Central Board of Direct Taxes (CBDT) has awarded a ₹3000 crore contract to LTIMindtree for developing an AI-powered tax analytics platform. The platform aims to enhance the Income Tax Department's analytical capabilities, enabling faster and more data-driven decision-making. This project is expected to significantly improve the department's overall efficiency.
